citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:21 AM on 24-
FEB-2022.
The Inspector arrived at the facility and called as well as texted all known contact numbers in our database. There was
no reply therefore messages were left on voicemail and via text. The Inspector waited for 30 minutes outside the closed
gate and then left the premises.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:21 AM on 24-
FEB-2022. 
 
The Inspector arrived at the facility and called as well as texted all known contact numbers in our database.  There was 
no reply therefore messages were left on voicemail and via text.  The Inspector waited for 30 minutes outside the closed 
gate and then left the premises. 
 
 
 
End Section
